name: slotassets
description: A simulated browser-based slot machine game demonstrating the AWS SDK for JavaScript V3.
author: Doug-AWS, AllanFly120

scripts.build:frontend: webpack MyLambdaApp/index.ts --mode development --target web --devtool false -o MyLambdaApp/main.ts
scripts.build:backend: webpack slotpull.ts --mode development --target node --devtool false --output-library-target umd -o index.ts
